txt.en: 'Good to see you, [placeholder]. We have gotten reports of a great legendary beast, Tarasâd, the Beast of Belfalas. It was seen rampaging through north Zamarzîr. Growing up in Umbar, we all heard the stories of the great Beast of Belfalas, but most knew never to pay them much mind. Well, several captains have reported losing men to a great beast, as long as four men and as wide as three, in the last week.\n\n'Please, investigate northern Zamarzîr and if you find the great beast, defeat it quickly, before it overcomes you.'
You have successfully defeated the great beast Tarasâd! Return with the Umbari scout to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to find the legendary Beast of Belfalas and subdue or defeat it.
'Wow, I never thought I'd see the day. Look at the size of that claw. You truly are a mighty warrior, [placeholder]. Thank you for doing this.'
'Your objective is clear, [placeholder]. Find the great beast Tarasâd in Zamarzîr, and subdue or defeat it.'
Complete Mission: The Beast of Belfalas
Your mission is to find the legendary Beast of Belfalas and subdue or defeat it.\n\nSpeak to Malthak to travel.
